channel.title: Getting .cfg/.java files displayed correctly
channel.description:
How do I get those files to be displayed so I can read them correctly? For example, the shop.cfg file seems to overlap at some points.
I'd just like to be able to view those files in a neat way. Is it possible?

item.title: Getting .cfg/.java files displayed correctly
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

I would be interested in this also, but I don’t think so because it is like a excel spreadsheet. All the points are seperated by tabs. I would assume you could rewrite the java files it inturpret a diffrent way, but as I’m new at java I wouldn’t be the person to do this.

Read full topic
